name: Mixed Security, Logic, and Quality Issues
expected_findings: Insecure password hashing using MD5 without salt in create_user
Insecure token generation using random.randint with weak digit-only token space
Weak session validation in validate_session - only checks if token exists without verifying authenticity or expiry
validate_email always returns True without any actual email validation logic
get_users calls undefined method fetch_user which will cause AttributeError at runtime
Missing docstrings for classes and methods
Missing error handling in get_users and other methods
